query.statement: SELECT DISTINCT A.SDATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY"³â"MM"¿ù"DD"ÀÏ"') AS SDATE_D FROM FMU_OP_RATE A, FMS_UPJANG B WHERE A.UPJANG = B.UPJANG AND B.MAIN_UPJANG = #MAIN_UPJANG# AND A.ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# AND A.ITEM_TYPE = 'M' AND A.SDATE <> '00000000' ORDER BY A.SDATE DESC
